name: Birdwing Blade
description:
In this Shoot'em Up you play as a criminal space pilot who uses his giant floating sword to help him escape from prison and fight the authorities!

WASD - Move |  Space - Attack  |  Shift - Change weapon

This is my entry for the Lost Cartridge Jam 2. Despite it's flaws and how unfinished it is I hope you enjoy my game!

Thanks to Cibbie for making the logo for this game.
